Author: jl777c#5810
Content: one new benefit for having the rogue blockchained just was discovered. The top players can be found by scanning the blockchain and then the games of these top players can be extracted and studied by others to learn. It is basically open sourcing the gameplay for the top players and this seems a qualitatively different thing than centralized gaming. granted you can watch selected players play but you dont really know for sure who the best of the best are

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content:
I've been listening to talks on indie gaming for the last three days, now even more than before I feel Decentralized Gaming with blockchain features is going to *absolutely* flip the table on  the "Indie gaming VS. AAA Gaming" markets status quo.  

It will be opening new doors for the indie devs/studios that will give them numerous advantages on top of their current main advantage-  being able to create intimate cult like communities around their work. Crypto-Conditions gaming smart contracts are bringing two very strong ideas together for a multi-faceted, decentralized, *Beast of Disruption*.
https://ibb.co/Ms1VjyZ

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: Just writing some things^ Still working out wording/ideas a bit.

Author: actionslacks#4072
Content: Yeah the more I think about it, the more I'm starting to understand the implications. I have some friends in the industry. I've shilled them so hard on btc over the years I get the feeling once I bring this up they'll just tune out. Need a good use case.

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: Studios will be able to raise funds, hand out DLC + special items, create a studio based marketplace for game items AND have an in game currency all on one chain.

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: and probably like 30 more things I havent thought of or exist yet

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: The verifiable game play is pretty cool too.  Certain players could even be given rewards based on their achievements

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: This opens a ton of new gamification layers

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: One thing for gamers is all the farming options it opens up.  You can farm characters that are tokens to sell through the marketplace/dex or anywhere else you can trade Game NFTs
